text: Ingotia is a genus of soft corals in the family Xeniidae. ==Species== The World Register of Marine Species lists the following species: *Ingotia bakusi Alderslade, 2001 *Ingotia scintillans (Thomson & Mackinnon, 1910) *Ingotia sprungi Alderslade, 2001 ==References== Category:Anthozoa genera Category:Xeniidae
title: Ingotia
